name: Super Sonoc Ultomote (Itch.io Release)
description:
Super Sonoc Ultomote was originally a scratch project, although months ago I decided I would put it on itch.io! Why did it come months later. Because I'm dumb and can't convert a scratch project to exe (even though it's easy). Also maybe I'll make a flash version as well. This is not supposed to be good, don't expect much.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Controls:
P for Punch
K for Kick
Q for Projectile
Up Down for Spin dash
M for Special
???????? for secret attack (Arrow Key Combination)
Green Flag to Restart
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Credits:
